name: Simple Story - Alex: Beer Truck Donation for developer
detailed_description:
This DLC is a donation for the developer. It won`t add or change anything in a game.

I do not hope that my games will bring me stable income or change my life. I just want to bring my stories to everyone who interested.
I really need a large sum of money, not for beer, but for expensive surgical operations instead. I hope what this DLC help me to collect at least part of this sum. I myself probably will never collect such a sum in my life. I have no illusion, but I want to be optimistic.

50% money from this DLC, will go to my surgical operations.
50% money will go to orphanages in Latvia (I will make photo-video reports and post them on the game forum).

If a miracle happens and the money for the operation will be collected, then all 100% of the sales will go to charity.
